channel.title: Trinidize!
channel.description:
Hi im Pur3 str
I have now been playing trinidize for about a month and have come along way it is a great server you can chose your exp rate (master, legend, hero, easy) it has good staff and has a very friendly community with lots of good content its an all around pking, skilling, eco server its for all types of players Come join today!!!
Sorry that i havnt added any pictures just rly havnt go much time but ill link you to where there are some pictures!!!
Features:
-24/7 Dedicated Server with No Lag -Full Screen Webclient -Full Summoning with BoB -Dugeoneering with XP, Tokens & Rewards -Perfect Switching -Massive PK Areas -Full pest control, barrows, duel arena, castle wars, warriors guild, and both fight caves with a special reward cape. -Curses & Regular prayers quick prayer selections fully working -Overload potions 100% -100% God Wars Dungeon with Bosses -Corp Beast -Tormented Demons -Full Torva, Pernix, and Virtus working -Spirit shields have effects -Fully web controlled account management with password recovery -Automated premium membership system -Forum based shop which automatically adds purchased items/points to your account -Premium member shop with lots of items and benefits -Great Combat -All Spells -NO DUPES -VERY active clanning community -Tons more...!
Mopar page With pictures of trinidize! http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=trinidize.com
Register here http://trinidize.com/index.php?app=core&module=global%C2%A7ion=register
Webclient http://trinidize.com/index.php?/page/play
Client http://www.trinidize.com/Client.zip
Highscores http://www.trinidize.com/highscores/
Home http://trinidize.com/

item.title: Trinidize!
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Quan Sun Quan
item.description:
@Sun_Quan wrote:

I don’t like this server simply because he doesn’t update it enough, His last update was in like may…I mean seriously? Yeah one could argue that he is just 1 developer but I can argue that I would much rather play a server with 3 developers that has updates bi-weekly/weekly.

Nonetheless good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Trinidize!
item.dc:creator: @Dispersion Dispersion
item.description:
@Dispersion wrote:

thanks but i can’t see hyow clicking a link to view pictures is hard for someone to do!?!

Read full topic

item.title: Trinidize!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:4, topic:445854”][quote author=Xi ShiFt iX link=topic=548715.msg4022432#msg4022432 date=1340118367]
Its a good game, the pictures are on server status page the link is supplied.
[/quote]

If you want players, you should make everything easier for them, not providing them with a link, but keeping all the information in one place.[/quote]This.

The website looks good; can’t say the same for the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Trinidize!

@Dispersion wrote:

Hi im Pur3 str

I have now been playing trinidize for about a month and have come along way it is a great server you can chose your exp rate (master, legend, hero, easy) it has good staff and has a very friendly community with lots of good content its an all around pking, skilling, eco server its for all types of players Come join today!!!

Features:

-24/7 Dedicated Server with No Lag
-Full Screen Webclient
-Full Summoning with BoB
-Dugeoneering with XP, Tokens & Rewards
-Perfect Switching
-Massive PK Areas
-Full pest control, barrows, duel arena, castle wars, warriors guild, and both fight caves with a special reward cape.
